description: To acquire, deliver, and install prefabricated collaborative phone booths in Quebec, Canada
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Request for Proposal: Prefabricated Collaborative Phone Booths

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition, delivery, and installation of seven (7) Prefabricated Collaborative Phone Booths in the province of Quebec, Canada.

### Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number:** WS3705480318
* **Publication Date:** November 22, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** December 7, 2022 at 14:00:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start/End Dates:** Not specified

The solicitation cancels and supersedes the previous bid solicitation number Doc3705493189 - F3766-220662 dated October 18, 2022. All required supporting documents and bid submissions must be submitted by December 7, 2022 at 14:00:00 EST.

### Proposal Requirements

The RFP is seeking proposals for the acquisition, delivery, and installation of Prefabricated Collaborative Phone Booths. The booths will be located in the province of Quebec, Canada.

### Evaluation Criteria

The proposal will be evaluated on the basis of the lowest price.

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

Julie Carbonneau
Departement of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
Phone: N/A, Email: julie.carbonneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
